info.name: Ottimizza OAuth2 API
info.description: # Servidor OAuth2.0 para autenticação de microserviços da Ottimizza.

item.name: Users

header.warning: This is a duplicate header and will be overridden by the Authorization header generated by Postman.

request.description:
# Method for fetching all users. --- ### URL Params > All arguments are **optionals**.
> All comparisons (except email) are made with **equals** operator. ## **Filtering**: ``` id=[number] username=[string] type=[number] email=[string]* ``` --- ## **Pagination**: ``` page_index=[number] page_size=[number] ```

response.name: 01 - Fetch All Users - Filter By Type
01 - Fetch All Users - Filter By Email
01 - Fetch All Users - Filter By Username
01 - Fetch All Users - Filter By Id

request.description:
# Method for making partial changes to an existing user. --- ### URL Params > Will change only the values passed on the body of the request.
> Null values are ignored. ## **Acceptable Arguments**: ``` firstName=[string] lastName=[string] ```

variable.description: The ID of the user being updated.

item.description:
Data Transfer Object (DTO)

```
id=[number]
username=[string]
email=[string]
firstName=[string]
lastName=[string]
type=[number]
avatar=[string]
organizationId=[number]
```
